title: Megadeth - Countdown To Extinction Live (DVD9)
description:
Countdown to Extinction: Live is a live album by American heavy metal band Megadeth, released on September 24 2013, through Dave Mustaine's Tradecraft label in Blu-ray, DVD, and CD formats. It was recorded during the band's "Countdown to Extinction 20th Anniversary Tour" at a show at Fox Theatre in Los Angeles, in December 2012,[ and features the band performing the entire Countdown to Extinction album.

Tracklist:
1. Intro: Prince Of Darkness
2. Trust
3. Hangar 18
4. Public Enemy
5. Skin O' My Teeth
6. Symphony Of Destruction
7. Architecture Of Aggression
8. Foreclosure Of A Dream
9. Sweating Bullets
10. This Was My Life
11. Countdown To Extinction
12. High Speed Dirt
13. Psychotron
14. Captive Honour
15. Ashes In Your Mouth
16. She Wolf
17. Peace Sells
18. Holy Wars...The Punishment Due
19. Credits: Silent Scorn / Dawn Patrol / Shadow Of Deth
